title: I built the CHEAPEST Gaming PC on Amazon
description: SUBSCRIBE for more bad ideas like this Pro tip: spend more than $318 on your gaming PC I got scammed at Best Buy:   AMD Athlon 3000G on Amazon:  MSI A320M-A Pro Max on Amazon:  4GB Astra-Gear RAM on Amazon:  120GB Adroitlark SSD on Amazon:  400W Coolmax PSU on Amazon:  8" Eyoyo Monitor on Amazon:  Logitech MK120 Mouse and Keyboard on Amazon:    By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
